name: Lag Simulator
description:
The Lag Test He who experiences lag should not be afraid, for the lag should be afraid of you

Use the arrow keys or WASD and press Spacebar to double jump over the lasers. The more you lag the more your jump height decreases! Do you need a new computer? Find out now! Make sure to post your high score below.

*Note: If you do not get at least 120fps on the counter, this game will not be playable on your computer! Also the windows build does not run better but allows for fullscreen (use escape to quit)

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/lag-simulator

This game was made for Ludum Dare Jam 51 Compo with the theme "Every 10 Seconds". All assets are original and made in 48 hours.
